size.description: Use the size prop to change the size of the Input.
size.description_zh: Use the size prop to change the size of the Input.

type.description: Use the type prop to change the input type, the default type is set to text, you can check all the available types at MDN.
type.description_zh: Use the type prop to change the input type, the default type is set to text, you can check all the available types at MDN.

placeholder.description: Use the placeholder prop to set a placeholder text.
placeholder.description_zh: Use the placeholder prop to set a placeholder text.

icon.description: Use any icon from Iconify by setting the icon prop by using this pattern: i-{collection_name}-{icon_name}.
icon.description_zh: Use any icon from Iconify by setting the icon prop by using this pattern: i-{collection_name}-{icon_name}.

:v-model.description: Use a v-model to make the Input reactive.
:v-model.description_zh: Use a v-model to make the Input reactive.

disabled.description: Use the disabled prop to disable the Input.
disabled.description_zh: Use the disabled prop to disable the Input.

loading.description: Use the loading prop to show a loading icon and disable the Input.
loading.description_zh: Use the loading prop to show a loading icon and disable the Input.

padded.description: Use the padded prop to remove the padding of the Input.
padded.description_zh: Use the padded prop to remove the padding of the Input.

slots.name: leading
slots.description: Use the #leading slot to set the content of the leading icon.
slots.description_zh: 使用 #leading 槽设置前导图标的内容。

slots.name: trailing
slots.description: Use the #trailing slot to set the content of the trailing icon.
slots.description_zh: 使用 #trailing 槽设置尾随图标的内容。
